AttributeSet.Name: App-Resources
AttributeSet.Description: Stores resources like translations for an app

Value.Value: The root page of the blog - needed for tag clouds and similar to make sure the link goes to the right place.
The root page to referr to from the RSS feed. The system will add /post/page-name by default; if you need a different behaviour, just adapt the feed-view.
This block will be added to the bottom of every post to show this author.
The main image for this post - commonly used in list-views etc.
Short text for use in most list-views.
This is the main part of your post.

This contains all the designed content-elements like galleries, responsively layouted elements, qr-codes, sliders or whatever. Usually you edit all this from the details-page of the post, this is just here in case you want to do something more complex with the data.

Create a google-optimized chain of words for your URL. Typically you would use the title and some keywords, then add some hyphens + use lower case. Example would be create-simple-blog-app-in-15-minutes-video.
This is when this post is released - date/time. It won't be shown on lists before this time, and this also affects sorting in most cases.
Use this to give the tag a higher importance in your tag clouds. 1 is less important than 10
A simple, lightweight but very adaptable blog for DNN
2blog - the ultimate simple blog (change this in app-settings)
This is a simple blog app using dnn and 2sxc. Change this description in the app settings.

Daniel Mettler grew up in the jungles of Indonesia and is founder and CEO of 2sic internet solutions in Switzerland and Liechtenstein, an 20-head web specialist with over 800 DNN projects since 1999. He is also chief architect of 2sxc (see forge), an open source module for creating attractive content and DNN Apps.

Daniel Mettler grew up in the jungles of Indonesia and is founder and CEO of 2sic internet solutions in Switzerland and Liechtenstein, an 20-head web specialist with over 800 DNN projects since 1999. He is also chief architect of 2sxc (see forge), an open source module for creating attractive content and DNN Apps.
Getting Started with the Blog App
The 2sxc Blog is a simple, highly customizable blog. You can use it just as it is, or change everything to fit your needs. It uses the best WYSIWYG on DNN, can be Multi-Language and way more...

The 2sxc Blog is a simple, highly customizable blog. You can use it just as it is, or change everything to fit your needs. It uses the best WYSIWYG on DNN, can be Multi-Language and way more...

This blog offers load of stuff, like

  1. Responsive List Views
    1. home-list view with the newest entries and paging
    2. posts by tag
    3. posts by author - which also shows the authors bio
    4. automatic image resizing - with different rules for wide/square pictures
    5. easy to adapt the look and feel to your own needs
    6. easy extensibility to create your own views as you need them
  2. Details view
    1. default view with post, author and tags
    2. automatic main image resizing
  3. Content Editing
    1. In-Page editing
    2. Best of breed WYSIWYG content-editor with drag-drop image & document upload and way more
    3. Advanced content-editing using app-mashups enables you to add galleries, sliders or any other app you want with in-page editing
    4. Content-mashup also allows you to use content-templates to build your post to look awesome and in line with all other content in your web site
  4. Rss Feeds

Getting More Infos about this Blog

And way more. Just so you know: this blog app demonstrates many of the features of 2sxc content management, so we'll write about it a lot in our own blog (which of course is made with this blog). 

  1. The 2sxc blog
  2. Posts about this blog and about blogging

Some Setup-Tips

In general the blog-app is self-contained - so if you put it on some page, it will automatically show a list of items with links to the details, and the details appear on the same page. Very simple. If you want to use the tag-cloud, then that should know what page to link to, since the cloud will usually not be on the same page as the blog itself. in that case you can set the main link in the app settings.
1 Main blog view showing newest items
Blog Posts for Home and Tags
One Blog Post by URL Parameter after /post/
Important: for the tag-cloud to work, it must know what page it should go for when it a user clicks on a tag. Edit this item to make it work.
Enhancing the Blog with More Apps
This blog can easily be enhanced with many more apps like galleries, designed content, sliders or even real-estate apps. Discover more...

This blog can easily be enhanced with many more apps like galleries, designed content, sliders or even real-estate apps.

2sxc Apps can be combined in unique ways, while still preserving content integrity and more. This allows us to create app mashups instead of adding features to any specific app. 

Enhance the Blog with more Apps

By the way - apps are lightweight simple things - and you can combine them with other apps to create awesome solutions. I recommend that you also check out

  1. The disqus app - to provide Q&A threads for each post
  2. The OWL Slider app for cool image sliders which you can use in the content of your posts
  3. The blueimp gallery / slider app for cool image galleries inside your posts
  4. The image-compare app to provide interactive, touch-enabled image-compare in your posts
  5. The timeline-app to enhance your posts with awesome, responsive timelines

Discover more

If you want to discover more, you should

  1. Check out the App catalog
  2. Read more about mashups on the 2sxc blog
May the 4th be with you - announcing the new DNN Blog App
Again on international Star Wars day we are presenting a big leap in DNN functionality: The Blog App. It's simple, elegant, and can be customized to be anything you want.

Again on international Star Wars day we are presenting a big leap in DNN functionality: The Blog App. It's simple, elegant, and can be customized to be anything you want.
